info.title: Azure SQL Database Import/Export spec
info.description: Provides create and read functionality for Import/Export operations on Azure SQL databases.

post.description: Imports a bacpac into a new database.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for importing a Bacpac into a database.

operationMode.description: The type of import operation being performed. This is always Import.

ImportExtensionProperties.description: Represents the properties for an import operation

properties.description: Represents the properties of the resource.

requestType.description: The request type of the operation.

requestId.description: The request type of the operation.

status.description: The status message returned from the server.

lastModifiedTime.description: The operation status last modified time.

errorMessage.description: The error message returned from the server.

databaseName.description: The name of the database to import.

edition.description: The edition for the database being created.

serviceObjectiveName.description: The name of the service objective to assign to the database.

maxSizeBytes.description: The maximum size for the newly imported database.

storageKeyType.description: The type of the storage key to use.

storageKey.description: The storage key to use.  If storage key type is SharedAccessKey, it must be preceded with a "?."

administratorLogin.description: The name of the SQL administrator.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the SQL administrator.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
